p.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent the the care support needs of the patient.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Care Support Needs subset with subset original ID 29991000000134.

p.p: The use of this subset is Advisory.

For further information on the use of SNOMED CT subsets in messaging please refer to the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains" document located under the Associated Specifications tab.
